SCENE_1_HINT_ENTER_GREEN: Try to enter the green sub-dimension
SCENE_1_VIDEO_1:
Space Device
- Able to split the world into sub-dimensions
- Able to enter the sub-dimensions

Space device requires entergy to operate.
The remaining energy is shown in the device.
SCENE_1_VIDEO_2:
Some objects only work in specific sub-dimensions.
The light of the object indicates the working sub-dimension.
SCENE_1_HINT: Use the space device to travel between the sub-dimensions.
